issue.title: sp_member_access errors all over: use boost::make_shared instead

content.raw:
`gz model` will try to connect to gazebo's master. If it can't then the tool should error out. If it can connect to the gazebo master, then your request should work (assuming a correct request).

Based on your previous comment, it seems like there might be a bug in either gazebo or in one of the plugins you are loading. 

Is there a script you run, or set of instructions, that can reproduce this problem?
content.html:
gz model will try to connect to gazebo's master. If it can't then the tool should error out. If it can connect to the gazebo master, then your request should work (assuming a correct request).

Based on your previous comment, it seems like there might be a bug in either gazebo or in one of the plugins you are loading.

Is there a script you run, or set of instructions, that can reproduce this problem?
